import*as at from'./actionTypes';// ACTION CREATORS;
/** needs to be an action creator
 * for each action type
 */ // All Campuses
export var fetchAllCampuses=function fetchAllCampuses(campuses){return{type:at.FETCH_ALL_CAMPUSES,payload:campuses};};export var addCampus=function addCampus(campus){return{type:at.ADD_CAMPUS,payload:campus};};export var deleteCampus=function deleteCampus(campusId){return{type:at.DELETE_CAMPUS,payload:campusId};};export var editCampus=function editCampus(campus){return{type:at.EDIT_CAMPUS,payload:campus};};//Single Campus
export var fetchCampus=function fetchCampus(campus){return{type:at.FETCH_CAMPUS,payload:campus};};//All Students
export var fetchAllStudents=function fetchAllStudents(students){return{type:at.FETCH_ALL_STUDENTS,payload:students};};// ADD STUD
export var addStudent=function addStudent(student){return{type:at.ADD_STUDENT,payload:student};};// DELETE STUD
export var deleteStudent=function deleteStudent(studentId){return{type:at.DELETE_STUDENT,payload:studentId};};//EDIT STUD
export var editStudent=function editStudent(student){return{type:at.EDIT_STUDENT,payload:student};};//Single Student
export var fetchStudent=function fetchStudent(student){return{type:at.FETCH_STUDENT,payload:student};};
